data.text: @LiquorStore11 @WFLA @WFLAJustin I dont know. Maybe ask the parents of the 42 kids that have died in Florida from Covid.
@DejectedDan @WFLA The people making big money are the ones pushing quack cures. WFLA should do a story on THAT.
@kikirodi64 Same. In fact, I don’t know ANYONE with a single issue. But these people are nuts…I feel sorry for their kids.
@WFLA @WFLAJustin Good. Glad they have the nuts to stand up for common sense because it’s in short supply in this state.
@WFLA @WFLAJustin I prefer to help the Florida Manatees survive in the waters of Florida then give Ron DeSantis another term as the worst American Governor in our lifetime!"

@WFLA @WFLAJustin 99.998% recovery rate for their age group. Why on earth do they need  it?  I wonder how much money that pediatrician has taken to promote the vaccine?  #FactsMatter https://t.co/NNnJbm8xgP
@tostitoo @WFLA @WFLAJustin My grandkids and all their friends took it no side effects!

@DebbieLew60 @WFLA @WFLAJustin Kids arent at risk.
